author: Paul Blest, Anne Torpey
title: Smithfield Foods Is Blaming 'Certain Cultures' for the Coronavirus Outbreak at Its Own Plant
description: “Living circumstances in certain cultures are different than they are with your traditional American family,” a spokesperson said, noting the plant’s “large immigrant population.”
content:
Smithfield Foods, the largest pork producer in the world, is blaming living circumstances in certain cultures for the huge COVID-19 outbreak at its own South Dakota plant.
There have been 725 confirmed cases among 3,700 workers at the Hong Kong-owned, Virgin… [+3307 chars]
